description: A high bowl. The interior panels are decorated with peach-sprays. The exterior with flowers, bamboo and a bird.
creator: : anoniem
title: Kom uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A high bowl. The interior panels are decorated with peach-sprays. The exterior with bamboo and butterflies. The narrow panels have lingzi (fungi). This piece is of better quality than the other ones of this type.
creator: : anoniem
title: Kom uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A high bowl. A moulded pattern on the inside consisting of vertical ribs. The central decoration consists of a crow or a bird on a rock which is encircled by a single band. The walls are decorated with two peach-sprays. The exterior is decorated with a landscape of birds.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Kom uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A high bowl without moulded pattern. There is no moulded pattern on the fragments from this bowl which has a fairly thick body. The interior is decorated with panels with flower and peach sprays. The outside is decorated with panels with spotted deer and rocks and plants painted in outlines.
creator: pottenbakker: anoniem
title: Kom uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A Saucer. The colour of the cobalt blue varies from grey to purple blue. The decoration on the inside consists of a flowering lotus plant with a duck underneath in the centre. On the cavetto 6 similar lotus plants are drawn.
creator: : anoniem
title: Kom uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte leeuw'
subject: Iconclasscode: 48AA98332

description: Grijs met blauwe kan van steengoed. De buik is bezaaid met in vlak reliëf opgedrukte rondjes op een donkerblauw, bijna paars, fond. Op de hals, onder de tuit een soort leeuwenmasker.
creator: : anoniem

description: A saucer. The colour of the cobalt blue varies from grey to purple blue. The decoration on the inside consists of a flowering lotus plant with a duck underneath in the centre. On the cavetto 6 similar lotus plants are drawn.
creator: : anoniem
title: Schotel uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'
